name: Spell Cards Please
description:
Created in  3 days for the Touhou Fan Game Jam 4.

Remilia is having another party, and she's low on staff tonight. You play as Patchouli, the impromptu bouncer. Check the Spell Cards of people trying to get into the party, and make sure they won't cause trouble. Just remember not to pick a fight with anyone, noodle arms.

Features:

Jokes!

Mediocre sprites!

An accidental jumpscare?

Sleeping!

Patchouli!

The entire game is a Papers Please parody!
